author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION HONE SLOWS AND STILL EXPECTED TO TURN TO  THE NORTHWEST SOON...
summary:
...TROPICAL DEPRESSION HONE SLOWS AND STILL EXPECTED TO TURN TO  THE NORTHWEST SOON...
 As of 2:00 PM HST Fri Aug 30
 the center of Hone was located near 21.9, -175.9
 with movement WNW at 8 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Hone (CP1/CP012024)
